    initializeData() - Method in class controller.IssuesListController
    Initializes the issues list view by configuring its cell factory, setting up mouse and keyboard shortcuts for opening issue details, loading issue data from the parent controller, and establishing focus behavior when the scene becomes active.

    initializeDueDateCol() - Method in class controller.AccountController
    Configures the Due Date column to display formatted due dates, or "N/A" when no due date is assigned.
    initializeIssueTitleCol() - Method in class controller.AccountController
    Configures the Issue Title column to display titles with tooltips and ellipsis when text overflows.
    initializeReporterCol() - Method in class controller.AccountController
    Configures the Reporter column to display the username of the issue's reporter.
    initializeStatusCol() - Method in class controller.AccountController
    Configures the Status column to display and allow editing of issue status via a combo box.
